fulltext:
Nguyen Van Duong
Senior PHP Developer
I'm Duong Nguyen. I achieved bachelor degree in Engineering from Military
Technology Academy. From 2010 to 2012, I took a course of ACCP at Hanoi
Aptech. Until now, I have had 6 year working experience with PHP,
Codeigniter , Magento and e-commerce system. From 2014 onwards, I have
worked as a full-time freelancer and have my own team to run overseas and
local projects. I'm in the way to search for a challenging position where I
can hone my management skill and stand for chances to experience new
technology and challenges.
